|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;F59L2G81A-25T; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC64M16GP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== CPE from '''[[SerComm]]''' sold by '''TIM''' (ex ''Telecom Italia'').
"AUR00B-1.6" is silkscreened on the main board in the images.
Builtin 4x GbE port LAN and 1x GbE WAN port, VDSL2 modem and 2x FXS :The SoC is a [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 and the 5GHz Wi-Fi BCM4360 :It has an 802.11n 2T2R (2.4GHz) Wi-Fi and 802.11ac 3T3R (5GHz)
See also [[SerComm]] and [[Huawei HHG2500]]..
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://smarthome.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2797312 ''Sercomm VD625'' on '''HWUpgrade''' forums] (IT) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=69603 ''Sercomm VD625 Teardown'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums]
